name: Typo (itch) (eggmceye)
description:
Typo is a typing tutor for the Commodore 64, for the 2021 ASCII BASIC GAME 10Liner jam: https://itch.io/jam/ascii-basic-10liner

Mash the keys and practice your touch typing "skills" as the letters fall down the screen. Lose points when hit the wrong key, and game over when score goes below 0 or a letter makes it to the bottom of the screen.

When playing in the browser, and it's game over, hit ESC: then type RUN to play again!

Readable source with comments is in the text file.

Browser emulator: https://lvllvl.com/c64/
